definitions.definition: The buttocks or more specifically, the anus .
A stupid , pompous , arrogant , mean or despicable person.
definitions.label_groups: chiefly UK , Ireland , Commonwealth , derogatory , slang

definitions.definition: Used in similes to express something bad or unpleasant .
A person ; the self ; (reflexively) oneself or one's person , chiefly their body ; ( by extension ) one's personal safety, or figuratively one's job, prospects, etc.

main_definition: ( Commonwealth , now vulgar ) The buttocks or more specifically, the anus .
secondary_definitions: ( chiefly UK , Ireland , Commonwealth , derogatory , slang ) A stupid , pompous , arrogant , mean or despicable person.
( vulgar , slang , uncountable ) Used in similes to express something bad or unpleasant .

( vulgar , slang , metonymic , countable ) A person ; the self ; (reflexively) oneself or one's person , chiefly their body ; ( by extension ) one's personal safety, or figuratively one's job, prospects, etc.
